summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DERMAL 10 Combo Pack Premium Collagen Essence Full Face Facial Mask Sheet - The Ultimate Supreme Collection for Every Skin Condition Day to Day Skin Concerns - Silky Cellulose Mask Sheet
Review Date: 2020/01/07
Store: DERMAL
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DERMAL', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '10 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 5 x 1.34 inches; 11.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '703856882157'}
Review Text: I like these masks for daily use, as they are somewhat moisturizing and no real fragrance that I can detect.  I like the variety of the pack and they are easy on my skin.  I did take off one star as they are not as moisturizing as a jelly type mask..these are more water-like...but they are nice in that they are collagen masks.  For the price they are nice.
Review Title: Nice Daily Mask
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LAPCOS Good Morning Fresh Quick Masks (30 Count) Daily Sheet Masks for Beauty & Skin Care - Hydrating and Moisturizing Korean Face Mask with Witch Hazel, Aloe Vera & Cucumber
Review Date: 2020/06/22
Store: LAPCOS
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LAPCOS', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 3 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '818929024478'}
Review Text: I really like this product...from the packaging to the actual mask.  It's really good..the mask moisturizes really well and after just 10 minutes, it feels similar to a serum on my face after I take it off.  Stays moisturized.  And the packaging is awesome....love the little container they are stored in, and I like the tweezers that are included to take the mask out without contaminating with fingers and trying to pull out a single mask.  It's very well done all the way around.
Review Title: Quick Moisture!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [miclan] Honey Nutrient Enriched Mask 10pcs - Mediheal Family Brand Facial Sheet Mask Full of Hydraiting Nutrients Skin with Honey and Propolis
Review Date: 2020/07/10
Store: miclan
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Miclan', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 4.21 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is one of the good kind of masks...you know, the ones that feel sort of jelly like and thick.  It's not watery, but very moisturizing.  I don't recall it having a fragrance to it...frankly most of them don't have much fragrance.  This one is very nice.  It has the paper peel off backing which is extra too.  I would re-order these masks!
Review Title: Very moisturizing...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ionic Hair Dryers for Women 1800W Blow Dryer with Diffuser Hot and Cool Settings Speed Adjustable Negative Ion Hair Dryer with 2 Concentrators,1 Hair Scalp Massager Brush for Curly Hair(LTD Edition)
Review Date: 2020/07/20
Store: Lassie
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lassie', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Speeds': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '11.4 x 9.4 x 3.7 inches; 2.43 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Lassie'}
Review Text: I had high hopes for this blow dryer...as I like the style of it and the colors.  I also liked that it is supposed to be 2000 watts.  I really didn't feel like this blow dryer worked as well as my cheap Revlon blow dryer that's 1800 watts.  This blow dryer doesn't seem to get as hot either.  It looks nice and it is light and smaller, so that is good.  But overall, I didn't really care for this one.  The buttons are clunky and hard to switch...might get looser over time, but  right now it's just not easy to switch to different settings.  There are just more cons than pros with this hair dryer.
Review Title: It's just okay...
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs)
Review Date: 2020/07/31
Store: Abib
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was not crazy about the design of the actual mask.  It comes with a top portion and a bottom portion...which didn't stay in place on my face very well...and was just too much packaging for a face mask.  This is also different in that it is an actual cream, rather than the clear gel type or watery type mask.  I did like the cream ok, but I use these masks when I am bathing, and the 2 part design just does not stay in place properly and drove me crazy.
Review Title: This is a 2 part mask
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2020/08/04
Store: Shakira
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'}
Review Text: ***Edited to add that this kept reminding me of something else I'd worn and now I'm thinking it is very similar to BBW Into the Night.***.  I was very pleasantly surprised by this scent....I like dark orientals and even though this is listed as floral gourmand, it fits the bill as a dark oriental for me.  I definitely get the base notes of vanilla, cocoa, tonka and benzoin....it is very reminiscent of a scent I used to wear a long time ago, but can't quite place it?  Maybe Euphoria?  Not sure, but this is a really nice rich dark scent that is heavier on the gourmand side than floral.  This is for sure a date night scent.
Review Title: A Rich Gourmand
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Bombs, SAZEN Bath Bomb with Natural & Organic Essential Oils, Shea Coconut Butter for Skin Moisturize, Bubble Spa Bath, Birthday Mothers Day Christmas Handmade Gift Set for Women Kids Her Him
Review Date: 2020/08/22
Store: SAZEN
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SAZEN', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Package Dimensions': '12.17 x 6.26 x 2.24 inches; 2.65 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SAZEN 01', 'UPC': '745103723622', 'Manufacturer': 'SAZEN'}
Review Text: These are a good set of bath bombs....that do add oils and scent to my bath.  I like the selection of scents in this set and the fizz is pretty good.  I did take off one star due to size as these are on the small to medium in size and I have a very large tub, so I need to use 2 of these to get enough moisturizing product in my tub.
Review Title: Nice set of bath bombs
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
Review Date: 2020/12/10
Store: invisibobble
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'}
Review Text: I didn't even know that Invisibobble made this combo hair scrunchie with the coil inside.  I think it is great.  Holds well and looks nice with the velour type fabric.  The only thing is this size might not work well for someone with really thick hair?  Not sure, but my hair is pretty fine and this only wrapped around it 3 times.  So for someone with thick hair it might not work?  This scrunchie really holds well...I wear it all day and overnight and it doesn't budge and feels very comfortable,  not too tight.
Review Title: Nice combo!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Claireceuticals Sweet Almond Oil for Hair, Face & Skin - Organic Almond Oil for Skin - Pure Almond Oil Moisturizer for Dry Skin - Facial Moisturizer for Women - Ideal Dandruff Remover - 1.69 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/06/19
Store: CLAIRECEUTICALS
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CLAIRECEUTICALS', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters'}
Review Text: I like it to use on my hair (just a couple of drops) keeps ends looking nice....and also my skin.  I use it in some of my natural skin products that I make...this is a good oil that does not cause any breakouts.  I do think in comparison to others this one is priced on the high side.
Review Title: Good Oil...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SportsWell Flexible Reusable Bun Deft Bun for Hair Magic Donut Hair Bun Maker French Twist Hair Tool Bun Crown Twister #1
Review Date: 2021/07/06
Store: SportsWell
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.6 Ounces'}
Review Text: It might work for a different hair type, but just ok for fine hair.  I have the real Carlin one and this one is not made as well and does not work as well with all hair types...but it might for yours?
Review Title: Just ok....
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Polish Due nails | Stretchable Real Nail Polish Strips| Gloss Solid Color, Ombre , French, Pattern, Glitter Finish 16Pcs | Includes Nail Wipe, Nail File, Instructional Brochure (Serenity Now)
Review Date: 2021/07/07
Store: POLISHDUE
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'POLISHDUE', 'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.87 x 0.28 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: Love these for a quick manicure to go!  I am very lazy when it comes to doing my nails and this is the perfect product for me.  It is fast and easy...don't have to worry about waiting for polish to dry, which is a pet peeve of mine.  These looked pretty nice and lasted a little better than polish for me, but not as long as I'd hoped and for that I did take off.  But for quick and easy, these do the trick!  I did notice that the photo shows them sparkly and mine were not?  These lasted about 4-5 days, but I am also in water a lot and pretty rough on my nails.
Review Title: Nice and quick
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HOMOST Starry Magnetic Cat Eye Gel Nail Polish Set, 6PCS Galactic Auroras Chameleon Gel Nail Polish Kit With Magnet
Review Date: 2021/09/07
Store: Homost
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Homost', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Black', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 3.23 x 1.18 inches; 6.7 Ounces'}
Review Text: Soo easy to use and so pretty!! I probably had both hands done in 15 minutes, so it didn’t take long to do or figure out. Also had it on almost a week and still looks like new. I highly recommend this set, great colors and really easy to apply!
Review Title: So Pretty!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

I definitely get the base notes of vanilla, cocoa, tonka and benzoin....it is very reminiscent of a scent I used to wear a long time ago, but can't quite place it?  Maybe Euphoria?  Not sure, but this is a really nice rich dark scent that is heavier on the gourmand side than floral.  This is for sure a date night scent.
Review Title: A Rich Gourmand
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: I didn't even know that Invisibobble made this combo hair scrunchie with the coil inside.  I think it is great.  Holds well and looks nice with the velour type fabric. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This person's purchasing history reveals a strong preference for skincare and beauty products, particularly sheet masks and moisturizing treatments. Consistently high ratings (4.0+) for hydrating and nourishing products indicate a focus on effective skincare solutions. They favor products with light or no fragrance and appear to appreciate animal cruelty-free options.

Themes of convenience and ease of use emerge, especially noted in their preference for daily wear items and quick application methods. While they value quality, they also demonstrate price sensitivity, often considering product effectiveness relative to cost.

In hair care, the individual shows a preference for lightweight and effective tools suited to their fine hair type, although they express dissatisfaction with some products that don’t meet their usability expectations. Their mixed ratings in hair accessories suggest they prefer versatile items that work across different hair types.

Lastly, a notable interest in organic and natural ingredients, as seen in oil-based products, aligns with their overall patterns of choosing gentle and nourishing options. While their perfume rating varies, the appreciation for richer, complex scents suggests a preference for more sophisticated fragrance profiles on special occasions.

Core preferences include:
- Hydrating and moisturizing beauty products
- Easy-to-use and quick-application options
- Focus on animal-friendly and organic formulations
- Moderate price sensitivity combined with quality expectations.

target_interaction.title: Beautiful Colors
target_interaction.text: These glide on perfectly and look really nice.  I love how easily these are to use....the brush on the other end makes these blend beautifully on my eyes.  Love the dramatic colors and still neutral enough too.  Really nice and they look great in my makeup drawer.
